title: Accounting Consultant (Bank Reconciliation Support)
job_overview:
Hi there! I'm looking for someone familiar with Deskera accounting who can help fix some bank reconciliation issues. I don’t have the time to sort it out myself and need a reliable expert who can jump in, spot what’s wrong, and get things back on track.

This is a remote, short-term gig — probably just a few hours of work for someone who knows their way around Deskera.

You should have:
- Solid experience with Deskera, especially with bank reconciliation
- A good eye for detail and accounting basics
- The ability to work independently and explain things clearly

If this sounds like something you can help with, I’d love to hear from you!
